name: Marvel Art Print Venom: Carnage Unleashed 46 x 61 cm - unframed
description:
Sideshow presents the Venom: Carnage Unleashed Fine Art Print by artist Matt Ryan Tobin, after Andrew Wildman. This intense Marvel art depicts an epic showdown between rival symbiotes - and the host caught at the center of it all.

Agony, thy name is Eddie Brock. Sharing everything, even their very flesh and marrow, Venom and his unfortunate host are beset by the blood-red villain Carnage, who tests the strength of their bond with his own powers. As Cletus Kasady's equally sociopathic symbiote plunges his claws into Venom and tears the inky black antihero from his host, Eddie screams and writhes in pain. Carnage can only grin at the satisfying scene he has created.

Inspired by Andrew Wildman's iconic cover for Venom: Carnage Unleashed #3 (1995), written by Larry Hama for Marvel Comics, this Venom art is now available to fans as an unframed giclée print or in a custom framed presentation. Each Venom: Carnage Unleashed Fine Art Print features an authorized, automated artist signature from Matt Ryan Tobin as well as an embossed Sideshow Seal of Authenticity.

The Venom: Carnage Unleashed Fine Art Print will only be available for a limited period of time, and then never again. Its final edition size will be set after the limited order window closes, and each piece will be numbered as part of the official print run. So be sure to order this exciting super hero artwork before it's too late!

Eddie Brock might be having a bad day, but yours can only be great when you bring home the Venom: Carnage Unleashed Fine Art Print by Matt Ryan Tobin.

Print details:

- Officially licensed by Marvel
- Limited edition
- 46 x 61 cm fine art giclée print
- Heavyweight 100% cotton, acid-free, certified archival Fine Art Paper
- Epson archival inks
- Embossed seal of authenticity
